name: OrderRumRetentionFilters
description:
Order RUM retention filters for a RUM application.

Use this tool to reorder the RUM retention filters for a specified RUM application. It returns the updated RUM retention filter objects without attributes when successful.

parameters.name: rum_application_id
parameters.description: The ID of the RUM application for which to order retention filters.

parameters.name: new_rum_retention_filter_definition
parameters.description: JSON object defining the new RUM retention filter. Includes a list of filter IDs with type. Expected format: {"data": [{"id": "UUID", "type": "retention_filters"}]}

id.description: ID of retention filter in UUID.

type.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be retention_filters.

data.description: A list of RUM retention filter IDs along with type.

value_schema.description: New definition of the RUM retention filter.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: New definition of the RUM retention filter.

id.description: ID of retention filter in UUID.

type.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be retention_filters.

data.description: A list of RUM retention filter IDs along with type.

value_schema.description: New definition of the RUM retention filter.
